scripts.build:public: npm run _build:frontend && rm -rf public && mkdir -p public && cp -a frontend/build/. public/
scripts._build:frontend: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm --prefix frontend ci || (NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm --prefix frontend install && npm --prefix frontend audit fix --force || true);     NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm --prefix frontend run build
